props.name: model
props.description: The model that the switch value syncs to

props.name: id
props.description: A unique identifier for the switch

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute of the switch

props.name: value
props.description: The value attribute of the switch

props.name: label
props.description: The label shown above the switch

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the switch label and can contain HTML

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when the switch is changed
